decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and the rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of two roof lights in the front roof slope and a window in the gable end, fixed shut and obscure glazed to 1.7m above the relative floor height would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the erection of a front porch would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class D of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class D. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The applicant was offered the opportunity to submit amended plans in order to make the proposal acceptable in planning terms.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE & REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION WITH ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT SLOPE AND ERECTION OF GROUND FLOOR PORCH.
